thread.title: Valentines Only '90s Girls Will Truly Understand

author: Tara Block
title: Valentines Only '90s Girls Will Truly Understand
text: Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Valentines Only '90s Girls Will Truly Understand If anything could make the romantic holiday of chocolate, amour, and flowers better, it would be '90s nostalgia . We were on the hunt for witty valentines that expressed love and friendship sentiments with references to some of the songs, TV shows, fashion, and games we gushed over in the '90s. And when we couldn't find exactly what we were looking for, we decided to make them ourselves! If you, too, want to have a Valentine's Day that pays homage to the decade of the Spice Girls and Skip-It, check out our '90s valentines! And download a printable version of the cards here . — Additional reporting by Laura Marie Meyers
